general.description:
The latest station built by the Purple Trail, this asteroid platform guards the State's side of the jump to the Candidate Systems border, completing a cluster of small outposts already scattered in the system.
It is by this route that Humans and Sshaads came first into contact and it has long been a contended sector, before the Candidate Systems formed to enter the Commonwealth and came to a truce with the Purple Trail. Now the two States are allies and the station is manned by a mixed crew.
Its basic role is to protect the route from piracy, along with Alshiinal station on the Candidate Systems side, as stated in the agreements between the two States.
general.bar: Mean-looking and proud Purple Guard and Candidate Systems pilots, along with some merchants and an occasionnal Shapeshifters group.
